snippet: Kris Medlen pitched six strong innings, while Brian McCann and Dan Uggla brought some long-missing punch to the plate for Atlanta as the Braves overpowered the Mets at Citi Field.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Atlanta Braves defeat New York Mets, 11-3; other baseball results noted.
lead_paragraph: Kris Medlen pitched six strong innings, while Brian McCann and Dan Uggla brought some long-missing punch to the plate for Atlanta as the Braves overpowered the Mets at Citi Field.

headline.seo: McCann and Uggla Come Alive as Braves Overpower Mets
headline.main: Recently Quiet Bats Back Medlen’s Pitching for Braves
headline.print_headline: Recently Quiet Bats Back Medlen’s Pitching for Braves Against Mets
